Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy because it has water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy because it lacks water.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy because it lacks light.
The student can show the difference between plants with enough water and light and those without.
The student can use the drawings to explain that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
